message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8,250. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to propose a price of $7,500. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement at this price.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8,000, which is the price I was originally looking for. This is the absolute lowest I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
